sys_ux_client_script.name: setHasRelationships

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_19b059e3979c7110a195bbe3a253af9a
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Service Relationships default">49b059e3979c7110a195bbe3a253af54</macroponent><name>setHasRelationships</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    let hasRels = false;
    let relTreeOutput = api.data.get_cmdb_service_relationship_1.output;
    if (relTreeOutput && relTreeOutput.tree && relTreeOutput.tree.length > 0)
        hasRels = true;
    api.setState('hasRelationships', hasRels);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-08-02 21:23:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>19b059e3979c7110a195bbe3a253af9a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>setHasRelationships</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_19b059e3979c7110a195bbe3a253af9a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-08-02 21:23:34</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
